duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in planning, procurement, storage, control, and distribution of materials and products according to company needs and customer requirements.
Develop efficient procurement solutions and support senior management with the development and implementation of sourcing strategies.
Negotiate the best prices and commercial conditions to ensure the best supply of components and maximize profit.
Lead the supplier management process from the identification of potential suppliers to supplier performance improvement plans.
Review stock levels to ensure optimal inventory is held on-site.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Relevant Field and 3-5 Years Relevant Experience
